item.title: Introduction
item.description: Quick Start # One page summary of how to start a creating form with react form. Quick Start → Help # How to verify if has a new version. Help →

item.title: Quick Start
item.description: Compatible # React — ReactJS React Native — React Native for mobile Installation # Using Yarn yarn add @resourge/react-form Using npm npm install @resourge/react-form --save Usage # const { form, // Form Data touches, isTouched, // Form touches errors, isValid, // Form validation context, // Context triggerChange, reset, merge, handleSubmit, field, onChange, getValue, changeValue,changeValue, resetTouch, getErrors, setError, hasError, watch, undo, redo } = useForm(formData, formOptions) useForm is the hook necessary to create forms.
